title: Keto Ham and Broccoli Creamy Casserole
directions: Preheat your oven to 350F. Use a large bowl to mix together the ham, broccoli, cream cheese, yogurt, mayonnaise, garlic salt, onion powder, basil, smoked paprika, rosemary, and thyme. Pour the casserole mixture into a greased casserole dish.
Top the casserole with shredded cheese and crushed pork rinds. Bake for 45-60 minutes or until the casserole is browned and bubbly.
